title: BRIEF-Sprouts Farmers Market Inc Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.29
text: 11 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-Sprouts Farmers Market Inc Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.29 Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Sprouts Farmers Market Inc: * SPROUTS FARMERS MARKET, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.29 * Q4 SALES ROSE 16 PERCENT TO $1.1 BILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.16 EXCLUDING ITEMS * SEES ‍FULL-YEAR 2018 NET SALES GROWTH 11.5% TO 12.5%​ * QTRLY COMPARABLE STORE SALES GROWTH OF 4.6% * SEES ‍ FULL-YEAR 2018 DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.22 TO $1.28​ * DURING Q4 OF 2017 RECORDED $18.7 MILLION OF INCOME TAX BENEFIT RELATED TO TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT * SEES ‍FULL-YEAR 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES $165 MILLION TO $170 MILLION​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.15, REVENUE VIEW $1.14 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.23, REVENUE VIEW $5.25 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES 2018 ‍COMPARABLE STORE SALES GROWTH​ BETWEEN 2.5 PERCENT TO 3.5 PERCENT * SEES ‍FULL-YEAR 2018 COMPARABLE STORE SALES GROWTH 2.5% TO 3.5%​
